quest.name: Under the Sea
journal: Though Rasho is a man of few words, he has some left to say.
objectives: Join Alisaie on the Isle of Bekko.
Search for the Blue Kojin village.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Thank you for placing your faith in me. All that remains is to carry out our promise...ambitious as it is.

dialogue.name: TANSUI
dialogue.text: Bold claims and even bolder promises. I should be interested to see if you can live up to them.

dialogue.name: RASHO
dialogue.text: So. Alone you will deal with the Kojin.

dialogue.name: RASHO
dialogue.text: If you are set upon this course, I shall give to you a word of advice.

dialogue.name: RASHO
dialogue.text: Two factions have the Kojin. The mercenaries who serve the Empire belong to the Red.

dialogue.name: RASHO
dialogue.text: Those who belong to the Blue are the traders. They have made no pact with the imperials, and so may be willing to aid your cause.

dialogue.name: RASHO
dialogue.text: Seek the Blue on the Isle of Bekko. There you will find a cave. The rest is up to you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Captain. We shall endeavor not to keep you waiting overlong for your sign.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Right, then. Let us head for─ Wait, where is Lyse? We cannot leave without her.

dialogue.name: RASHO
dialogue.text: We will be watching.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Hm? Forename? What is it?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to wander off. I...I just wanted to have a think.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You're worried we won't be able to live up to our promises?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: No, it's not that at all! If anything, I'm frustrated that I didn't think of it first...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Yda and my father had a way with words. They knew how to inspire people─how to bring them together. I always hoped I might have something of that in me too, but I'm starting to think I don't.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: What am I even doing here...?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Lyse, you─

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Gods, listen to me! I don't know where that came from. Forget I said anything!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We have places to go, imperials to fight, and friends to save! And we're not going to get any of it done by standing around here moaning, right?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: ...Right?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Before we first traveled to Gyr Abania, I was in Limsa Lominsa, visiting...visiting a friend. A young child who had been through a great deal.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...That's neither here nor there, I suppose. Anyway, on the way back, I passed a patisserie which sold some of the most exquisite-looking tarts I had ever seen. I've always preferred cookies, to be honest, but nevertheless I decided to stop and try one...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...I'll treat you to one, when all this is over. Forename too─and I won't take no for an answer.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: What about Y'shtola? We'd never hear the end of it!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: All right, all right─Y'shtola too, once she's better. Deal? Good. Then let's hurry, shall we? We have a million things to do before then!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Red, Blue... Wait─didn't Soroban say something about this before?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I think this is the Isle of Bekko─though, to be honest, it looks the same to me as however many other islands around here...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Rasho said there was a cave that would lead us to their village. We should search further inland.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: How much further do you think it is?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Of course! Soroban said he was a Kojin of the Blue, didn't he?

dialogue.name: SOROBAN
dialogue.text: Pleased though I am to see you again, I am confused. Were you not bound for Othard?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: How fortunate that we should find a familiar face in this place...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We should tell Soroban about our situation. If anyone here can help us, it's him!
